\n<Alice>\."Not everyone get's to meet a criminal like me."
\n<Alice>\."It's only natural to be in awe."
\n<Ranmaru>\."That's not really why I was here..."
\n<Alice>\."No need to be shy, give me your questions."

\n<Alice>\."No need to be shy, give me your questions."
\n<Alice>\."It was difficult, I often acted as an older brother to
\n<Alice>\."Forgetting who I was really supposed to be a big
\n<Alice>\."It was a hurdle I needed to overcome to be a better
person. In the end it paid off for as long as it did."
\n<Alice>\."Looking back onto it now, I would never wish a life of
stress and contracts upon anyone else."
\n<Alice>\."It was almost like how they described it in grade
school. Although you can't escape with a spoon."
\n<Alice>\."It made me tough but not in the way I wanted to be."
\n<Alice>\."I blame this on my mother, however I can't do anything
\n<Alice>\."It made me tough but not in the way I wanted to be."
\n<Alice>\."Not a lot more to say about it."
\n<Alice>\."She loves Samurai Yaiba and the songs that my sister
\n<Alice>\."By far the most trustworthy person here."
\n<Alice>\."I hope Hinako didn't push her too hard..."
\n<Alice>\."My feelings on him are neutral. He speaks truth however
I feel as if it could be brought up better."
\n<Alice>\."Although I say this as if I would say anything he
said out loud, especially in this group of people."
\n<Alice>\."I stand here as nothing but a silent supporter."
\n<Alice>\."I've seen she's been very touchy with Miss Sasahara.\!
Strange to say the least, however who am I to deny their
\n<Alice>\."For now I believe I'll stay quiet..."
\n<Alice>\."Despicable I say!\! I will not forgive them for
\n<Alice>\."It breaks my heart to see someone so innocent being
\n<Alice>\."Grrr! Miss Mishuku! You will be punished!"
\n<Alice>\."Whatever the case may be, I do not like her."
\n<Alice>\."He's a strange man, I do want to talk to him in my own
time. \!He seems to have a longing sense to stay with
\n<Alice>\."I've attempted to monitor him but to no avail..."
\n<Alice>\."Whatever the case may be, we should stay wary..."
\n<Alice>\."She's often with Tsukimi, although I'm not too sure
she wants to be with him. I'm just sure she's tense
\n<Alice>\."I think she's a lovely lady, although I haven't had
the pleasure of getting to know her."
\n<Alice>\."Hmmm, I believe you're a wonderful fello, although
\n<Ranmaru>\.\c[1](I think I'll stay quiet about that comment...)
\n<Alice>\."He's a coward. I don't like him at all."
\n<Alice>\."He's always shivering and talking to himself.\.\. I'm\|
suspicous of him\.\., to say the least."
\n<Alice>\."I want to speak to him.\! Face\.\. to face."
\n<Alice>\."The thought of a betrayer in the group.\| I can't
\n<Alice>\."I will stay strong though, no need to panic over
something \.\.that as of now is pointless."

\n<Alice>\."I want to speak to him.\! Face\.\. to face."
\n<Alice>\."The thought of a betrayer in the group.\| I can't

\n<Alice>\."It was difficult, I often acted as an older brother to
\n<Alice>\."Forgetting who I was really supposed to be a big
\n<Alice>\."It was a hurdle I needed to overcome to be a better
person. In the end it paid off for as long as it did."
\n<Alice>\."Looking back onto it now, I would never wish a life of
stress and contracts upon anyone else."
\n<Alice>\."It was almost like how they described it in grade
school. Although you can't escape with a spoon."
\n<Alice>\."It made me tough but not in the way I wanted to be."
